meanings.definition: Relating to or containing iron and magnesium.
meanings.sent1: The ferromagnesian properties of the metal made it strong and durable.
meanings.sent2: The geologist identified the rock as ferromagnesian due to its high iron and magnesium content.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's suit was made of a special ferromagnesian material that made him invincible.
meanings.sent4: Her ferromagnesian willpower helped her overcome any obstacle in her path.
meanings.sent5: The ferromagnesian taste of the mineral water reminded him of the earthy elements within.

meanings.definition: A mineral or rock containing iron and magnesium.
meanings.sent1: The miners discovered a rich ferromagnesian deposit in the mountain.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a beautiful ferromagnesian specimen found in the nearby quarry.
meanings.sent3: The ferromagnesian boulder rolled down the hill, causing a comical scene.
meanings.sent4: The ferromagnesian treasure gleamed in the sunlight, attracting many curious onlookers.
meanings.sent5: The ferromagnesian rock formation stood out among the surrounding landscape, a testament to its unique composition.
